header.description: Single transaction record with payment acknowledgment details and static branding elements

rows.description: No row iteration — single-record display only

semantics: All tokens are scalar pass-through values. No user-driven filtering is required; the application layer selects the specific transaction record to render. Static assets (logos, URLs, disclaimers) are unresolved and should be injected as runtime constants.
transformations: No reshape transformations required — direct scalar mapping from transactions table
Date and time are stored as separate columns and displayed as-is (no formatting transformations in contract)
Currency amount (bill_amount) displayed with 'Rs.' prefix in template, no decimal formatting in contract
